name: Ice Grapplers
description:
Description:

You fell into an ice ravine, but luckily you have your grappler with you. 

So with the help of it you try to avoid evil monsters and get out.

Controls:

- Left Click to shoot your hook

- WASD to move around

Credit:

This game was made by Bittnin and DarkDragon = BittDragon.
